CustomField.description: Used to score Partner Operation Analyst List Management
CustomField.formula: (CASE(List_Saved_to_Client_Folder__c, "Yes",1, "No",0, 0)+ CASE(List_Criteria_Created__c , "Yes",1, "No",0, 0)+ CASE( Case_Issue_Number_Is_Tied__c , "Yes",1, "No",0, 0)+ CASE( Status_Updated_Appropriately__c , "Yes",1, "No",0, 0)+ CASE( List_Clarity__c , "Yes",1, "No",0, 0)+ CASE( No_Apparent_Red_Flags__c , "Yes",1, "No",0, 0)+ CASE(Number_of_Records_Fields_Updated__c , "Yes",1, "No",0, 0))/7
CustomField.label: List Management Score - Old
